name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Genea Ancestry Add To Tree Auto-Clicker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically checks or unchecks all checkboxes when adding new information or people to your Ancestry family trees.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This lightweight extension adds a link at the top of the "Add new information to your tree" page which automatically selects all checkboxes attached to parents, spouses and children when adding new information or people to your Ancestry family trees. 

It does not select the checkboxes attached to the facts below the people, as they should be manually verified and is not always wanted. 

Check out Genea Research Tools in the Chrome Web Store, which adds custom features for Ancestry and MyHeritage to enhance your research workflow!

Created by Dan Maloney at Genea.ca - If you encounter any bugs or have suggestions, feel free to contact me at hello@genea.ca.
